title: Reconstellation: A Strategy and Creativity Program
preview: I'm one of the "featured established creators" in this program
body:
A couple people I know recently put together a three-month-long coaching program called [Reconstellation](https://www.supercycle.org/reconstellation), with the tagline “forge better life strategies through creativity.” This is the first program like this that they’ve done, and they invited me to be a “featured established creator.”

There are still some spots left in the program. It is application-based, and if you’re interested then you can [apply here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfdhCq0YCiUMhnTXopUOFfXZLUnrTAnorzFlAwr8BbQZhkEHw/viewform) (deadline December 15th).

Note: If you are a paid subscriber to my Substack and you join Reconstellation, then they’ll give you a 15% discount! It’s a small program, so there isn’t a code for this or anything — if you want to claim the discount, just email me and I’ll let them know.

***

Thank you for reading Solar Light. [If you'd like to subscribe on Substack, you can find](https://lydialaurenson.substack.com/about) *[Solar Light](https://lydialaurenson.substack.com/about)* [there.](https://lydialaurenson.substack.com/about) I can also be found elsewhere on the internet as Lydia Laurenson :)
